trans-unit.source: /sdkpath | Microsoft Docs
/sdkpath
Specifies the location of Mscorlib.dll and Microsoft.VisualBasic.dll.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Mscorlib.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualBasic.dll 的位置。

trans-unit.source: Syntax
Arguments
The directory containing the versions of Mscorlib.dll and Microsoft.VisualBasic.dll to use for compilation.
trans-unit.target: 包含要用于编译的 Mscorlib.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualBasic.dll 的版本的目录。

trans-unit.source: This path is not verified until it is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 它加载之前，不会验证此路径。

trans-unit.source: Enclose the directory name in quotation marks (" ") if it contains a space.
trans-unit.target: 将目录名称括在双引号 ("") 如果包含空格。

trans-unit.source: Remarks

This option tells the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] compiler to load the Mscorlib.dll and Microsoft.VisualBasic.dll files from a non-default location.
trans-unit.target: 此选项可告知[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]编译器从非默认位置加载的 Mscorlib.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualBasic.dll 的文件。

trans-unit.source: The `/sdkpath` option was designed to be used with [/netcf](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/netcf.md).

The [!INCLUDE[Compact](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/includes/compact_md.md)] uses different versions of these support libraries to avoid the use of types and language features not found on the devices.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[Compact](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/includes/compact_md.md)]使用支持不同版本的这些库来避免使用的类型和语言功能在设备上找不到。

trans-unit.source: The `/sdkpath` option is not available from within the Visual Studio development environment; it is available only when compiling from the command line.
trans-unit.target: `/sdkpath`选项不是在 Visual Studio 开发环境中可用; 只有当从命令行进行编译，它才可用。

trans-unit.source: The `/sdkpath` option is set when a [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] device project is loaded.
You can specify that the compiler should compile without a reference to the Visual Basic Runtime Library by using the `/vbruntime` compiler option.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定通过使用编译器应编译而无需对 Visual Basic 运行库的引用`/vbruntime`编译器选项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [/vbruntime](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/vbruntime.md).
Example

The following code compiles `Myfile.vb` with the [!INCLUDE[Compact](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/includes/compact_md.md)], using the versions of Mscorlib.dll and Microsoft.VisualBasic.dll found in the default installation directory of the [!INCLUDE[Compact](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/includes/compact_md.md)] on the C drive.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码编译`Myfile.vb`与[!INCLUDE[Compact](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/includes/compact_md.md)]，使用版本的 Mscorlib.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualBasic.dll 的默认安装目录中找到[!INCLUDE[Compact](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/includes/compact_md.md)]C 驱动器上。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you would use the most recent version of the [!INCLUDE[Compact](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/includes/compact_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，将使用的最新版本[!INCLUDE[Compact](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/includes/compact_md.md)]。

[/netcf](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/netcf.md)
[/vbruntime](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/vbruntime.md)
